thread.title: Catch up on ‘The Hunger Games’ before ‘Mockingjay – Part 2’ releases
thread.title_full: Catch up on ‘The Hunger Games’ before ‘Mockingjay – Part 2’ releases | Examiner.com

author: David Wangberg
title: Catch up on ‘The Hunger Games’ before ‘Mockingjay – Part 2’ releases
text:
Play THE HUNGER GAMES FRANCHISE – First 3 Movies on Blu-Ray and Digital HD Now! Lionsgate Unlocked The final installment of the “Hunger Games” franchise, “Mockingjay – Part 2,” is almost here. And before it opens, many fans will be revisiting the first three in the series as preparation.
In honor of the release of the franchise’s concluding chapter, Lionsgate has compiled a short “Best of” video that looks at not just some of the most enthralling scenes of the film, but also some of the cool, behind-the-scenes stuff that can only be found on the Blu-rays. Be sure to check out the full video at the top of this article.
“ The Hunger Games: Mockingjay – Part 2 ” will release to theaters on Nov. 20. Advance tickets are currently on sale at your local movie theater.
